Articles.Content: Hi I'm newish been a fan for a wile but I just got a computer just so I could play ksp its not the best as its a used one but it works and I'm excited to get started I'm sure I'll be posting a lot soon so I thought I should say hi to the comunity first
Hello Apex-prey. I'm glad you're able to enjoy the game.
I was so happy when my (aging) graphics card died because it meant I could get a newer one that supported KSP better ^^.
Ya I'm still setting everything up didn't even have an os on it all my post so far have been from my tablet
